alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 6:34PM AKST until December 13 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 9 to 20 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp
